body:
Scheduling a remote interview is often challenging. From alternating between multiple apps to checking with interviewers and candidates for their availabilities and sending out calendar invites, scheduling remote interviews consumes a big chunk of our time.

To make this process seamless, we have integrated our interviewing platform with two of the most widely used calendar apps - Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook.

You can now install the HackerRank calendar add-on to your calendar app and schedule HackerRank Interviews straight from your calendar.

Refer to the following articles to get more info on the integration.

  1. HackerRank Interview and Google Calendar Integration
  2. HackerRank Interview and Microsoft Outlook Integration
title: Calendar Add-ons for HackerRank Interviews
